Visitors will be directed to a replica of the painted burial chamber, which will be installed close to Carter's former home in Luxor. Replicas of two other closed tombs will be opened nearby. There's no alternative. Closing the tombs is the only way to preserve them, said Zahi Hawass , Egypt's antiquities chief.
